summary:
Weapon, Armor, and junk item salvaging back to useful resources
!!!Now clean with TESVEdit!!!
descriptionHtml:
Weapon, Armor, and junk item salvaging back to useful resources
!!!Finally fixed everything that TESVEdit hated! Thank you Sharlikran!!!

_____Ancient Nord___|__---see caveats---_|_____smelter

_____War Axe_____________|_____x2
_____War Hammer__________|_____x2


caveats
_____-Ancient Nord items are treated as weathered steel. When being scrapped they return 1 less steel than regular steel items, and if that would drop the return to 0 it is changed to 1 iron. The exeptions to this are the "Honed" and "Supple" variants, these return the same as normal steel items.
_____-Forsworn armor returns leather, but weapons are made from wood and rock, so return the decoration items (feathers, claws, beaks)
_____-Scaled items return Steel but at 1/2 the amount of other steel items
_____-Studded items return steel but at 1/3 the amount of other steel items
_____-jewelry containing gemstones return x1 of the most prominant gemstone on the item model

Changes from vanilla
_____-Steel recipe now calls for x2 charcoal instead of Corundum
_____-Corundum Bars now used with Iron Bars to make steel
_____-Built-in breakdowns for dwemer items now changed to only show up if you have one in your inventory
_____-Push-mill changed to a workshop (before Hearthfire did it even...go me!)
author: JediaKyrol
